name: Ext_R2_ConceptMap_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ConceptMap.source[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.source[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Identifies the source of the concepts which are being mapped
element.definition: The source value set that specifies the concepts that are being mapped.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.source[x]` maps to R4 `ConceptMap.source[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Identifies the source of the concepts which are being mapped
element.definition: The source value set that specifies the concepts that are being mapped.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.source[x]` maps to R4 `ConceptMap.source[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
